content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am looking to rent it out for the highest price possible, so I'm interested in hearing what you think would be a fair rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.

I understand that the rent is being paid monthly, and that is acceptable to me.

I also understand that I am responsible for paying for the electricity and water bills.

I would appreciate it if you could provide me with the necessary paperwork to proceed with the rental agreement.

TERMINATE.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your offer of 700 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to pay for the electricity and water bills. However, I am afraid I cannot agree to this price. I am looking for a higher rental price in order to maximize my gains. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I will need to continue negotiating.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that you are looking for a higher price, but 700 Euros per month is a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. If you are unwilling to accept this price, I will need to find another renter.

I am willing to come back and see the apartment if you are able to offer a higher price.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

TERMINATE.

I am unable to accept the price of 700 Euros per month for the apartment. Thank you for your offer, but I will need to look elsewhere. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

I am open to coming back and seeing the apartment if you are able to offer a higher price.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

TERMINATE.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer of 700 Euros per month, but I am looking for a higher rental price. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I will need to continue negotiating. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
